description: A delicious and crunchy hot dog with a slightly spiced slaw.
name: Hot Dogs with Mango Slaw & Crispy Onions Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small mango, peeled, de-seeded and finely chopped
4 medium hot dog buns, sliced in half lenghtways

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and cook the sausages as per packet instructions which is usually about 20 minutes.
While the sausages are cooking, combine the coleslaw with the diced mango, sriracha, soy and mustard and set to one side.
Slice the buns in half lengthways and then toast for 3 minutes.
Once the sausages are cooked, place them in the buns and serve with the spiced slaw and crispy onions.
